seo: ZEIT Next.js,路径遍历漏洞,2.4.0版本,/_next
summary: 检测ZEIT Next.js框架至2.4.0版本中是否存在/_next路径遍历漏洞，通过发送特定请求验证是否能读取到系统敏感文件（如/etc/passwd）。
summary_en: Detect the path traversal vulnerability in ZEIT Next.js framework up to version 2.4.0 by sending specific requests to check if it can access system sensitive files (e.g., /etc/passwd).
